hero.title:
Everything you need to
scale faster
hero.description: From powerful analytics to seamless integrations, we provide the toolkit you need to build world-class applications without the headache.

sync.title: Real-time Synchronization
sync.description: Changes propagate instantly across all devices. Whether your users are on mobile, desktop, or tablet, they see the same data at the exact same time.
sync.check_1: Offline support out of the box

analytics.title: Actionable Analytics
analytics.description: Don't fly blind. Get deep insights into user behavior, system performance, and revenue metrics. Visualize your data with beautiful, interactive charts.
analytics.check_1: Export to PDF, CSV, or Excel

dark_mode.title: Dark Mode
dark_mode.desc: Built-in support for light and dark themes with automatic system detection.

api_first.title: API First
api_first.desc: REST and GraphQL APIs available for full programmatic control.

sso.title: SSO Login
sso.desc: Enterprise-grade Single Sign-On support for Google, GitHub, and Okta.

audit.title: Audit Logs
audit.desc: Track every change made to your project with detailed timestamps.

rbac.title: Role Based Access
rbac.desc: Granular permission controls for admins, editors, and viewers.

uptime.title: 99.99% Uptime
uptime.desc: Guaranteed availability with our globally distributed CDN.
